data.title: software engineering launch intern
details: Reduced account lockout and improved user experience by building recovery features on the desktop client to be used in case of lost access to 2FA codes
Improved password safety by implementing encryption and decryption libraries to address key security concern of accidental plaintext password logging

data.title: computer science engineer intern
details: Eliminated bugs and added features to Capture the Flag (CTF) Scoreboard used at company-sponsored events, NCP training, and the Maryland STEM Festival (Node.js)
Drove initial development of web app hosting ”Zazzys” that help to incubate innovation, enable collaboration, and drive greater speed and agility via crowdfunding
Demo of early prototype by Leadership Council in front of Parsons CEO secured $75,000 of project funding on the spot

data.title: maryland center for women in computing ambassador
details: Visited a local school once a week to educate and expose more students to computing through hands-on activities
Developed curriculum and attended outreach and professional development events

data.title: teaching assistant
details: Undergraduate TA for HACS100: Foundations in Cybersecurity under Dr. Jan Plane
Graded and helped design homework and quiz problems, offered office hours to reinforce concepts taught in lecture
